name: Trolley Problem (s_b_c)
description:
Trolley Problem

This is my entry for the Monthly Game Jam

The game was created under the influence of the trolley problem.

You need to choose the path where the train will go.  Click on people to find out their biography.

There are 3 kinds of people: good, neutral and villains. Your goal is to choose a path where there are more villains.

Train speed and number of people depends on the number of levels passed.

Good luck :)
